1370: Ludingus moved to Koe straet.A.4 after marriage.
Got married to Linnea at age 23 in 1370.
Had a son with Linnea, Folpertus, at age 23.
1372: Had a daughter with Linnea, Hildeburgis, at age 25.
1373: Had a daughter with Linnea, Emmelina, at age 26.
1374: Had a daughter with Linnea, Lisebette, at age 27.
1376: Had a son with Linnea, Ricward, at age 29.
1378: Had a daughter with Linnea, Siwa, at age 31.
1381: Had a son with Linnea, Arnulphus, at age 34.
1384: Had a son with Linnea, Clais, at age 37.
1385: Had a son with Linnea, Dammas, at age 38.
1386: Had a daughter with Linnea, Baua, at age 39.
1389: Lost daughter Emmelina when Emmelina was 17 years old.
1390: Lost son Dammas when Dammas was 6 years old.
